summary: The module provides an asynchronous workflow that classifies a collection of user questions into predefined categories such as contact lookup, timeline queries, document search, comparison, email retrieval, photo search, or summarization, leveraging OpenAI's language model via the instructor library and Pydantic models for data validation.
business_intent: Enable automated routing of incoming user inquiries to the appropriate downstream service or knowledge base, improving response efficiency and reducing manual triage effort.
